data.name: Cam Circle VR
data.detailed_description:
Cam Circle VR is a mixed reality (MR) tool that shows part of your real world in VR.
Activate it by double tapping the headset or by pressing both grip buttons.

Cam Circle currently supports HTC Vive, Vive Pro 1, Vive Pro 2 and Valve Index headsets.

Cam Circle can be used while running other VR software and games.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 MB available space
